transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan Naveen ji.
Customer: Hello ji.
Executive: Ji Pawan baat kar raha tha sir aapke registered email id pe sir bhej diya hai Manish ne mere ko bhi loop in kiya hua tha. It will be taking seven to ten days aur aapke usi same account mein aayega sir. Amount bhi aapka mention kar diya hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur transaction number bhi humne waha pe update kar diya sir. Ek baar check kar lijiye. Main close karu sir isko?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Mujhe bahut dino se call nahi tha.
Customer: Ek second. Sir ek feedback bhi jayega Manish ke liye ki jo aapke coordinate kiya hai inhone sab kuch ka.
Customer: Pehle refund ho jane dijiye.
Executive: Haan sir ho jayega. Feedback to hota hi rahega.
Customer: Na matlab sir ye bhi taking seven seven to ten days koi bhi problem hai already.
Executive: Bylet bhi consume karke dekhenge na sir. You are not able to consume. Aap kar lijiye sir dekho main itna din hold kiya isliye nahi. Dekho sir meri taraf se agar kuch bhi pending tha maine wo karke diya. Even we have shared you over your registered email id with my official email id. Ek baar check kar lijiye sir. Nahi hota hai within seven days you can call me lekin ho jata hai sir already we have proceeded. Ye hamara final.
Customer: Main wahi keh raha hu ki seven to ten days aapne likh ke diya hai to usko thoda sa dekh lete hai hai na.
Executive: Sir it will be sir lekin ye jo concern hai to isko pending rakhna sir will be affecting jo hai delay jo pending hai wo keval. Sir jo complaint open hai na sir complaint number hai 9683381 sir ye wala. To isko main closer ke liye ja raha hu kar raha hu. Iska feedback aayega sir aapke liye. Agar aapke paas saat din mein nahi refund hota hai you can revert me lekin ho jata hai 100% ho jata hai sir.
Customer: Isme complaint number kahan pe mention hai?
Executive: Sir aapke paas ek aaya hoga aap ek baar registered email id pe jaiye apne email id pe likhiyega number 9683381.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Bas aap waha pe jo gmail aata hai na sir gmail pe jo search bar aata hai usme aap likhiyega 9683381.
Customer: Ek second. Hmm.

Customer: 96 9683381 83381
Customer: 9683381. Haan haan haan.
Executive: Aaya sir? Haan sir. Ye resolution 17 November hai na sir haan. Haan. Ye complaint number hai sir. Isi ke resolution ke liye aaj jo hua hai sir pura final account team se bhi update ho gaya aur same aur aapki complaint bhi wo sorry aapki services bhi band ho gayi you are while consuming of the bylet na jab aap bylet consume karenge you won't be able to. To ye services close ho gayi sir hamare taraf se. Bas refund ka seven to ten days ka time hai sir jo maine aapko email id pe bhi likh diya hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai to jo bhi cheeze process hone dijiye hai na.
Executive: Aap apne end se process kar dijiye.
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu. Haan maine to main I will be closing this concern you will be getting a feedback for Manish sir as well as for me and the reporting manager of Manish aur meri email id kumar.pawan@indiamart.com jo Manish ne mail kiya hai usme bhi meri email id hai sir. Agar nahi aata hai to aap waha pe bhi revert kar sakte hai aap. Definitely I will contact you. Definitely main aap logo se contact karunga ya se bhi karunga se bhi karunga bilkul sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir. To aap us mail pe bhi kar sakte hai theek hai sir. So we will be closing you will be getting a feedback for me. Hai na sir. It will not be a feedback for Indiamart it will be a feedback ki aapki concern pe Manish ne aur Pawan ne kaam kiya ki nahi kiya. So it has been done from our side so you can share the feedback for us. Okay sir?
Customer: Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer awaiting refund.

- Customer wants refund before feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund in 7-10 days.

- Executive shared complaint number for reference.

- Executive confirmed services are closed.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check registered email ID.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, complaint, email, feedback
